Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       He nods and dashes to the nearest hatch but he pauses there looking at 
the sky.  He sees the rusty haze approaching from the direction the pod had 
been in.  Backpedaling he closes the door and turns back to Kup.  "Sir, 
unless I'm mistaken, the pod has found us."

--part1_12a.24a4d145.2b9823d9_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
